title: mA ramaNu
sahitya:
mA ramaNu nI varamu mAkEmi vicAramu


anupallavi

  krUrapAda kulatO jata gUDamu koncepu narulanu koniyADamu


 caraNam 1    parulalaina madilOna tiTTamu parama ghAtakAni koTi gaTTamu 
vara dhana vantula katapa meTTamu valaci anya bhAmala cEbaTTamu
    caraNam 2    hari bhaktulatO nEStamu sEtumu apaninyalu palka venatIgatumu 
karivaradAyani gantulu vEtumu kAla bhaTula meTa baTTi dOtumu
    caraNam 3    peddalatO kallalATamu prItilEni tAvu tongi cUTamu 
koddi sampadalaku narulanu bATamu gOpAla dAsula viTanADamu
